text:
In the field of information communication, I would like to talk about the television. Television is a pretty new media, it comes around the middle of the 20 century with the period of modernity. It was like a revolution for the press. At the beginning, it was like a luxe to have one at home. With time and the democratization of TV, it became less expensive and easier to get one. In the 1970’s , TV in the house was like a place to regroup the family, but some years later, we can find a TV in, nearly, each room of the house. That means, TV has become more individual than it was a fews years ago.
In anoter way, today, TV has become a media with a very economic and political system. Everything is calculated. So for people who watch it, they do not have all the information and the truth, reality. The time is limited,  journalists analyze the subject relative to their point of view and the point of view of the journal (political aspect), the information is chosen. Now, TV is not neutral, and people do not realize that. TV stays an important media, but to have real information with anything hidden, you need to check on several media or chaine. In that way, you can make your own opinion on what happens etc.
